import React, { useEffect, useState, useContext } from "react"; import { AuthContext } from "../../Helpers/AuthContext"; import Axios from 'axios'; import { Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import Ads from "../Ads"; import Profile from "../Profile"; import Name from "../Name"; function User() { const { authState, setAuthState } = useContext(AuthContext); const [applicationList, setApplicationList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/userApplication/list`, { headers: { accessToken: localStorage.getItem("accessToken"), }, }) .then((response) => { setApplicationList(response.data); console.log(response.data); }); }, []); return (
{applicationList .map ((applicationDetails, key) => { const jobTitle = applicationDetails.job_title; const compName = applicationDetails.user_id; return (

{jobTitle}

job Type

Pending

 ); }) }
); } export default User;
